name: endASAP meeseek
description:
Mr. Meeseek wants to die already, help him finish his run and die as soon as possible!

- move with AWSD or arrow key
- hit cactuses and rocks to reduce your hp
- collect hearts to replenish hp (but I just wanna die!)

the game was made for the first 7wells indie game jam under 6 hours for the theme "break the mechanic", by me and  kuskus. 

soundtrack on youtube
